entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in XBRL rule processor (xule) successful, version Check version using Tools->Xule->Version on the GUI or --xule-version on the command line. - xule
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC
[info] Activation of plug-in Validate EFM successful, version 1.21.1. - validate/EFM
[info] Activation of plug-in Inline XBRL Document Set successful, version 1.1. - inlineXbrlDocumentSet

[DQC.IFRS.0126.9595] The statement 1004 - Statement - Consolidated Statement of Cash Flows includes an inconsistent calculation. The value of the concept ifrs-full:CashFlowsFromUsedInOperations of 622,900,000 should be equal to the sum of its child components defined in the calculation linkbase. The sum of these child components is 856,900,000. The values of the addends is determined by adding the values of the child concepts with a decimal value of -5. All values in the financial statements should use the same decimal value. The values reported in the financial statement in the current reporting period of 2021-01-01 to 2021-12-31 should be complete if the financial statement is to be mathematically accurate and complete. The components of ifrs-full:CashFlowsFromUsedInOperations that should add to 622,900,000 are comprised of the following:
+ AdjustmentForDepreciationOfPropertyPlantAndEquipment 206,000,000 - AdjustmentForShareOfProfitLossOfAJointVenture 16,000,000 + PreviouslyCapitalisedExplorationAndEvaluationExpenses 54,100,000 + ReversalOfImpairmentOfInvestmentInJointVentureClassifiedAsOperatingActivities 0 (Incorrect decimals: -6 ) + AdjustmentsForAmortisationExpense 9,400,000 + AdjustmentsForDecreaseIncreaseInInventories 5,000,000 + AdjustmentsForDecreaseIncreaseInTradeAndOtherReceivables -99,800,000 + AdjustmentsForImpairmentLossReversalOfImpairmentLossRecognisedInProfitOrLossExplorationAndEvaluationAssets 80,100,000 + AdjustmentsForIncreaseDecreaseInEmployeeBenefitLiabilities 17,700,000 + AdjustmentsForIncreaseDecreaseInTradeAndOtherPayables 55,200,000 + AdjustmentsForInterestExpense 74,200,000 - AdjustmentsForInterestIncome 1,700,000 + AdjustmentsForProvisions 3,800,000 + OtherAdjustmentsForNoncashItems 1,000,000 + ProfitLossBeforeTax 233,900,000 + ProfitLossBeforeTax 233,900,000 + ProfitLossBeforeTax 233,900,000 + ProfitLossBeforeTax 233,900,000 + ProfitLossBeforeTax 234,000,000 + ProfitLossBeforeTax 234,000,000 + ProfitLossBeforeTax 234,000,000 + ProfitLossBeforeTax 234,000,000
The addends are calculated based on the calculation linkbase defined for 1004 - Statement - Consolidated Statement of Cash Flows. If addends are missing then the calculation tree should be amended. The rule will not add dimension components as the financial statement does not include a table. If dimensions are used on the statement then add a table to ensure that the dimensions are defined correctly.
Total Element : ifrs-full:CashFlowsFromUsedInOperations Total Value : 622,900,000 Total period : 2021-01-01 to 2021-12-31 Dimensions : Decimals : -5 Rule Element Id:9595 Rule version: 17.0.2 - https://filings.xbrl.org/213800L3HZUNJ2457M66/2021-12-31/ESEF/NO/0/rakpetroleumplc-2021-12-31.zip/rakpetroleumplc-2021-12-31/reports/rakpetroleumplc-2021-12-31.html 22783

[DQC.IFRS.0126.9595] The statement 1002 - Statement - Consolidated Statement of Comprehensive Income includes an inconsistent calculation. The value of the concept ifrs-full:ProfitLoss of 217,700,000 should be equal to the sum of its child components defined in the calculation linkbase. The sum of these child components is 451,600,000. The values of the addends is determined by adding the values of the child concepts with a decimal value of -5. All values in the financial statements should use the same decimal value. The values reported in the financial statement in the current reporting period of 2021-01-01 to 2021-12-31 should be complete if the financial statement is to be mathematically accurate and complete. The components of ifrs-full:ProfitLoss that should add to 217,700,000 are comprised of the following:
- IncomeTaxExpenseContinuingOperations 16,300,000 + ProfitLossBeforeTax 233,900,000 + ProfitLossBeforeTax 233,900,000 + ProfitLossBeforeTax 233,900,000 + ProfitLossBeforeTax 233,900,000 + ProfitLossBeforeTax 234,000,000 + ProfitLossBeforeTax 234,000,000 + ProfitLossBeforeTax 234,000,000 + ProfitLossBeforeTax 234,000,000
The addends are calculated based on the calculation linkbase defined for 1002 - Statement - Consolidated Statement of Comprehensive Income. If addends are missing then the calculation tree should be amended. The rule will not add dimension components as the financial statement does not include a table. If dimensions are used on the statement then add a table to ensure that the dimensions are defined correctly.
Total Element : ifrs-full:ProfitLoss Total Value : 217,700,000 Total period : 2021-01-01 to 2021-12-31 Dimensions : Decimals : -5 Rule Element Id:9595 Rule version: 17.0.2 - https://filings.xbrl.org/213800L3HZUNJ2457M66/2021-12-31/ESEF/NO/0/rakpetroleumplc-2021-12-31.zip/rakpetroleumplc-2021-12-31/reports/rakpetroleumplc-2021-12-31.html 22652
